page.title: 10EDUCATION IN CHOPGATE.
page.content: Chopgate School was built in 1909 by Lord Feversham.Chopgate School has got thirty one children, two teachers, a cook,caretaker and a secretary.The highest number of children was thirty four and the lowest number was nineteen in our time.The dinner lady is Mrs Hugill and she is the caretaker as well.We have most subjects like Maths,Science,Writing,English,Art, P.E,Games,and Woodwork.Mrs Short cooks the dinners for us we pay Â£3.35p for five days.We win just as many competitions as any of the bigger Schools.We go on lots of school trips to the seaside and other places.We have apparatus for P.E.We have two sports days.One at Ingleby School and one of our own.I think you learn more at a little school.We like Maths, English,Science,and Games.
